LOADING_SCREEN.SettingEnabledHint: Display the custom loading screen when switching scenes.
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingImageFolderHint: Choose a folder with images for the loading screen. If a scene doesn't have its own folder, this one will be used.
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingCustomTextHint: The text displayed on the loading screen.
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingShowProgressHint: Display an animated progress bar during loading.
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingFadeDurationHint: How long the loading screen fade-in and fade-out animations last.
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingTipRotationHint: How often a new tip is displayed (during longer loading times).
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingTemplateHint: Choose the design/template for the loading screen.
LOADING_SCREEN.SettingCustomTipsHint: Create your own tips (one tip per line). If empty, default tips will be used.
LOADING_SCREEN.CustomTipsDescription: Enter your own tips here, one per line. These will replace the default tips. Leave empty to use default tips.
LOADING_SCREEN.CustomTipsPlaceholder:
Tip: Your first custom tip
Tip: Another tip
Tip: And one more...
LOADING_SCREEN.CustomTipsHelp: Each line = one tip. Empty lines are ignored.
LOADING_SCREEN.SceneTabDescription: Configure the loading screen specifically for this scene. With multiple images in the folder, one will be randomly selected.
LOADING_SCREEN.SceneImageFolderHint: Leave empty to use the default folder. With multiple images, one will be randomly selected during loading.
LOADING_SCREEN.SceneFolderSaved: Loading Screen folder for scene saved!
LOADING_SCREEN.ConfigDescription: Here you can set a custom image folder for each scene. Images from the folder will be randomly used as backgrounds. With multiple images, a random one is selected each time.
LOADING_SCREEN.DefaultFolderHint: This folder is set in the general module settings.
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpStep1: Create a folder in your Foundry installation with loading screen images
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpStep2: Set the 'Default Image Folder' in the module settings
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpStep3: Optional: Configure individual folders for specific scenes here
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpStep4: Click the folder icon to select a folder
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpBehavior1: If a scene has its own folder, only images from it will be used
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpBehavior2: Without a scene folder, the default folder will be used
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpBehavior3: With multiple images, one is randomly selected
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpBehavior4: With only one image, it will always be used
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpTip1: Use images with 1920x1080px for best results
LOADING_SCREEN.HelpTip2: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF
